explains: n. 写博客的人；博客使用者

sentences.en: "This is not a crazy idea," says blogger Phil Plait.
sentences.cn: 博客主人费尔·普莱特说：“这不是一个疯狂的想法。”

sentences.en: "From now on, boycott any movie with Jackie Chan involved," said Bei Feng, a prominent blogger.
sentences.cn: “从现在开始，抵制任何有成龙参与的电影。”知名博主北风说。

sentences.en: Turkish food blogger Cenk Sönmezsoy shared his favorite food.
sentences.cn: 土耳其美食博主森克·索内梅索伊分享了他最喜欢的食物。
